invocations.description: Pauses the execution of the current script for waittime milliseconds and resumes once that interval has elapsed.
invocations.exDescription: Will say 'hi', wait for 2.5 seconds and then say 'trade' on the NPC channel.

invocations.description: Pauses the execution of the current script for a random interval between waittimefrom and waittimeto milliseconds and resumes once that interval has elapsed.
invocations.exDescription: Will say 'hi', wait for 2~3 seconds and then say 'trade' on the NPC channel.
